body_html: Every Estimator.train call will re-create whole graph (including input-fn) by design. If you want to evaluate periodically without impacting training, as Derek mentioned please give tf.contrib.estimator.InMemoryEvaluatorHook a shot.
body_text: Every Estimator.train call will re-create whole graph (including input-fn) by design. If you want to evaluate periodically without impacting training, as Derek mentioned please give tf.contrib.estimator.InMemoryEvaluatorHook a shot.
body: Every Estimator.train call will re-create whole graph (including input-fn) by design. If you want to evaluate periodically without impacting training, as Derek mentioned please give `tf.contrib.estimator.InMemoryEvaluatorHook` a shot.
